bio: Developer with 10 years of experience and just a good guy.
contributionDescription:
* I am a lead investor and CEO of the Foumis project, which is being developed on the Optimism stack. At the moment it exists only in concept format, but we have already recruited a team and started working.

* I use and financially support many projects launched in the Optimism network.

* Active user of your Discord. Always helping people with advice.

contributionLinks.description: The site will be up and running in the near future.
